data.message: Help! Since the new update on my phone I can no longer edit more than the first line of any post or comment and for the group I admin I can no longer click on the name of any pending requests.

replies.message: Sorry you are having trouble, Jessica. If you're on the latest version of the app, please report your issue here: http://bit.ly/2dTdE9o. -Joe
fb can you see my messages (messenger) for you? Please help me ..
Hi, Yan. How can we help you? -Rhea
Hi Sam. Please help our team track this issue by reporting it with these tips from our Help Center: http://bit.ly/2erMH7S. Thanks. -Jessica

Hi Sam. The best way to report something on Facebook is by using the Report link that appears near the content itself. To learn more, please visit our Help Center at: http://bit.ly/2efTvdI. Due to the volume of reports we receive, we're unable to reply to every one. We do review them all and appreciate your patience! -Jessica
Facebook I reported the problem back on 10/14, I'm still having the same problem. It is impossible to view pending requests to my group from my phone now.
fb, see "messenger " . That have my questions.. Please help me
